title: Agnez Mo
summary: Agnes Monica Muljoto (born 1 July 1986), known professionally as Agnez Mo (stylized as all caps), is an Indonesian Diva, singer, songwriter, music producer, actress, dancer, model, and businesswoman. She was professionally known as Agnes Monica before amending her new stage name.  As a bilingual singer who records in Indonesian and English, she is known for her image reinventions and musical versatility throughout her careers.
